channel.title: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?
channel.description: How do you add admins and mods to your server and another question how will you kick them and ban them and make them admins and moderators?

item.title: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?
item.dc:creator: @kriskuhar kriskuhar
item.description:
@kriskuhar wrote:

Falutin57, To make a player Admin or Mod, and even Owner…

1.Open your source
2.Go To Characters
3.Find The Players File
4.Change Character-Rights, From 0, to 1 - Mod, 2 - Admin, 3 - Owner.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?

item.title: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“lord dharok, post:3, topic:318578”]or u can make a command like this is my give admin command i also made a hidden admin command

}

 if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kyle")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sm(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/quote]

wouldn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?

item.title: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?
item.dc:creator: @lord_dharok lord dharok
item.description:
@lord_dharok wrote:

or u can make a command like this is my give admin command i also made a hidden admin command

}

 if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kyle")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sm(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }

Read full topic
item.source: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?

item.title: How to add admins into your moparscape server and the features?
item.dc:creator: @rob_all_over rob all over
item.description:
@rob_all_over wrote:

to make them admin or mod go into there character file and change the file named playerrights = 0
change it to 1 for mod 2 for admin and if your server has it 3 for owner

Read full topic
